title: Man mishandles gun, accidentally shoots himself near Rainbow and Oakey
content:
LAS VEGAS (KSNV News3LV) —
A 61-year-old man is in serious condition after accidentally shooting himself.
The shooting took place in the 1800 block of Rainbow Boulevard near Oakey, Friday night.
Lt. CJ Jenkins with Metro police says the man mishandled his .22 revolver and accidentally discharged a round, hitting himself in the torso.
The man was transported to UMC Trauma and is currently in serious condition.
No other details have been given. Check back for updates.
